name: DailyPhilosophy
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Timeless knowledge that is essential when dealing with the complexities of modern life. Embrace every day by devoting one to three minutes on insights that will enrich your life. This includes powerful quotations, historical anecdotes and provocative commentary presented from a practical standpoint.
Live in the moment, be aware of your circumstances, tackle any problem or approach any goal. 

„Of all people only those are at leisure who make time for philosophy, only they truly live.“ ~ Seneca

Please feel free to reach out to me with any questions, feedback or constructive criticism. I would also love to hear your thoughts and ideas about this format as well as your personal stories. 

andreas-maucher@gmx.de.


Created with InfluVoice <3
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
